mapper.update: update bd_device set imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org = #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, man = #{man,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, servicedate = #{servicedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, imei, org, man, phone, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag, servicedate from bd_device where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, imei, org, man, phone, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag, servicedate from bd_device
